children.string: [Act as if You Are Staying in a Community Forever—Even When You’re Not](https://www.christianitytoday.com/ct/2021/june-web-only/act-as-if-staying-in-community-forever-olmstead-uprooted.html) #[[church/theology]] #[[inoreader]]
Written by:: Mallory Rentsch, for [[Christianity Today]]

Excerpt:: As I write this, I am one month and two days from moving halfway across the country. After nearly eight years in Minnesota—by far the longest I’ve ever lived anywhere—we’re moving to Pennsylvania.

Excerpt:: I will extol you, O LORD, for you have drawn me up, and did not let my foes rejoice over me. O LORD my God, I cried to you for help, and you have healed me. O LORD, you brought up my soul from Sheol, restored me to life from among those gone down to the Pit.
